Package org.svvrl.goal.core.aut

Class OmegaUtil.CycleFinder

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractAlgorithm
org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.OmegaUtil.CycleFinder
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, Algorithm, AlgorithmListener
Enclosing class:
OmegaUtil
static class OmegaUtil.CycleFinder
extends AbstractAlgorithm
A CycleFinder is able to find all elementary cycles of an automaton.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

  • Constructor Details

    • CycleFinder

      public CycleFinder​(Automaton a)
      Constructs this object to find cycles in an automaton.
      Parameters:
      a - the source automaton where the cycles are going to be found

    • CycleFinder

      public CycleFinder​(Automaton a, StateSet set)
      Constructs this object to find cycles in an automaton. The cycles are limited in a specified area.
      Parameters:
      a - the source automaton where the cycles are going to be found
      set - the maximal area of cycles

  • Method Details

    • getCycles

      public java.util.List<StateList> getCycles()
      Returns all elementary cycles of the automaton.
      Returns:
      elementary cycles of the automaton
